summary: This release brings a handy live timer and loading spinners to the searcher, making your search experience feel more responsive. We've also launched a new domain finder dashboard to simplify managing your blog's address. Behind the scenes, we've conducted a thorough security audit and made important fixes to keep your data safe, all while smoothing out the development process across our tools.

features: add live elapsed timer and loading spinners to searcher
add domain finder dashboard for domains.grove.place
fixes: address security and robustness issues in domain finder
